Review Title: This is the True Dunkirk Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Dirty Dancing: 30th Anniversary Digital Review Date: 2017/09/17 Store: Jennifer Grey (Actor), Patrick Swayze (Actor), Emile Ardolino (Director) & 0 more Rated: PG-13 Format: Blu-ray Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies Product Description: ['Product Description', "Its the summer of 1963 and Baby is stuck at the Catskills with her parents. Attempting to make the best of the situation, Baby attends the organized classes on merengue dancing and wig demonstration. Suddenly, all of that changes when she meets Johnny Castle, the resort's dance instructor. With Johnny, Baby learns the steps to a new dance--a dirty dance--that allows her to discover new strengths and new talents in order to define her place in a rapidly changing world. Under the influence of Rhythm and Blues, Baby can now express herself and her love for Johnny. ;NEVER-BEFORE-SEEN Happy Birthday, DIRTY DANCINGNEVER-BEFORE-SEEN Patrick Swayze: In His Own WordsNEVER-BEFORE-SEEN Patrick Swayze UncutNEVER-BEFORE-SEEN Eleanor Bergstein Thoughts On A Lifetime Of DIRTY DANCINGOuttakes/ deleted/ alternate/ extended scenesMusic VideosThe DIRTY DANCING PhenomenonThe Rhythm Of The DancingOriginal Screen TestsCast & Crew Interviews (Jennifer Grey, Eleanor Bergstein, Miranda Garrison, Kenny Ortega)Commentary with Writer/ Co-Producer Eleanor BergsteinCommentary with Kenny Ortega, Miranda Garrison, Jeff Jur, Hilary Rosenfeld and David Chapman --Lionsgate.", 'Review', 'NEVER-BEFORE-SEEN Happy Birthday, DIRTY DANCINGNEVER-BEFORE-SEEN Patrick Swayze: In His Own WordsNEVER-BEFORE-SEEN Patrick Swayze UncutNEVER-BEFORE-SEEN Eleanor Bergstein Thoughts On A Lifetime Of DIRTY DANCINGOuttakes/ deleted/ alternate/ extended scenesMusic VideosThe DIRTY DANCING PhenomenonThe Rhythm Of The DancingOriginal Screen TestsCast & Crew Interviews (Jennifer Grey, Eleanor Bergstein, Miranda Garrison, Kenny Ortega)Commentary with Writer/ Co-Producer Eleanor BergsteinCommentary with Kenny Ortega, Miranda Garrison, Jeff Jur, Hilary Rosenfeld and David Chapman --Lionsgate'] Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 8.32 Ounces', 'Audio Description': 'English', 'Director': 'Emile Ardolino', 'Media Format': 'NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 41 minutes', 'Release date': 'February 7, 2017', 'Actors': 'Jennifer Grey, Patrick Swayze, Jerry Orbach, Cynthia Rhodes', 'Producers': 'Linda Gottlieb', 'Studio': 'Lionsgate', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '2'} Review Text: Love, youth and heartbreak. Still rewatch this often even after 30 + years. A movie for the ages. Review Title: Heartwarming and Heartbreaking Classic Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Vera: Set 7 Review Date: 2017/12/15 Store: Brenda Blethyn (Actor), Kenny Doughty (Actor), Jamie Childs (Director), Louise Hooper (Director) & 1 more Rated: NR Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, British Television Product Description: ['OSCAR NOMINEE BRENDA BLETHYN (Pride and Prejudice, Atonement) returns as Detective Chief Inspector Vera Stanhope in this acclaimed mystery series inspired by the novels of Ann Cleeves. Against the stunning backdrop of rural Northumberland, Vera and her assistant, Detective Sergeant Aiden Healy (Kenny Doughty, Stella, Black Work), strive to solve vicious crimes that menace their community. This season finds Vera and Aiden investigating several mysterious deaths, including a park ranger found washed up on the shores of a remote wildlife reserve, a drug addict, a promising young journalism student, and a woman who had disappeared six weeks earlier. Despite her unconventional ways and abrasive personality, Vera continues to captivate in this long-running British mystery that is “sheer heaven for fans of police procedurals” (The Philadelphia Inquirer).'] Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Mystery & Suspense/British Mystery Theater, Television/Crime', 'Format': 'NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Jamie Childs, Kenny Doughty, Louise Hooper, John Hayes, Brenda Blethyn, Lee Haven Jones', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '4', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'AMP2613', 'Director': 'Jamie Childs, Louise Hooper, Lee Haven Jones, John Hayes', 'Media Format': 'NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '6 hours and 13 minutes', 'Release date': 'October 24, 2017', 'Actors': 'Brenda Blethyn, Kenny Doughty', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': 'Acorn', 'Number of discs': '4'} Review Text: Very involved and convoluted stories.
Vera is less disheveled and cranky than in series 1-6. Miss her snarky comments to her underlings. Review Title: Sharp but Less Snarky! Blomquist'], 'Starring': ['Diane Keaton', 'Jane Fonda', 'Candice Bergen']} Review Text: Light hearted comedy with some dramatic issues: men vs. women. A change of pace for me which had me laughing at times. Review Title: Women can Sell a Movie Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

Under the influence of Rhythm and Blues, Baby can now express herself and her love for Johnny. ;NEVER-BEFORE-SEEN Happy Birthday, DIRTY DANCINGNEVER-BEFORE-SEEN Patrick Swayze: In His Own WordsNEVER-BEFORE-SEEN Patrick Swayze UncutNEVER-BEFORE-SEEN Eleanor Bergstein Thoughts On A Lifetime Of DIRTY DANCINGOuttakes/ deleted/ alternate/ extended scenesMusic VideosThe DIRTY DANCING PhenomenonThe Rhythm Of The DancingOriginal Screen TestsCast & Crew Interviews (Jennifer Grey, Eleanor Bergstein, Miranda Garrison, Kenny Ortega)Commentary with Writer/ Co-Producer Eleanor BergsteinCommentary with Kenny Ortega, Miranda Garrison, Jeff Jur, Hilary Rosenfeld and David Chapman --Lionsgate.", 'Review', 'NEVER-BEFORE-SEEN Happy Birthday, DIRTY DANCINGNEVER-BEFORE-SEEN Patrick Swayze: In His Own WordsNEVER-BEFORE-SEEN Patrick Swayze UncutNEVER-BEFORE-SEEN Eleanor Bergstein Thoughts On A Lifetime Of DIRTY DANCINGOuttakes/ deleted/ alternate/ extended scenesMusic VideosThe DIRTY DANCING PhenomenonThe Rhythm Of The DancingOriginal Screen TestsCast & Crew Interviews (Jennifer Grey, Eleanor Bergstein, Miranda Garrison, Kenny Ortega)Commentary with Writer/ Co-Producer Eleanor BergsteinCommentary with Kenny Ortega, Miranda Garrison, Jeff Jur, Hilary Rosenfeld and David Chapman --Lionsgate'] Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 8.32 Ounces', 'Audio Description': 'English', 'Director': 'Emile Ardolino', 'Media Format': 'NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 41 minutes', 'Release date': 'February 7, 2017', 'Actors': 'Jennifer Grey, Patrick Swayze, Jerry Orbach, Cynthia Rhodes', 'Producers': 'Linda Gottlieb', 'Studio': 'Lionsgate', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '2'} Review Text: Love, youth and heartbreak. Still rewatch this often even after 30 + years. A movie for the ages. Review Title: Heartwarming and Heartbreaking Classic Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Vera: Set 7 Review Date: 2017/12/15 Store: Brenda Blethyn (Actor), Kenny Doughty (Actor), Jamie Childs (Director), Louise Hooper (Director) & 1 more Rated: NR Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, British Television Product Description: ['OSCAR NOMINEE BRENDA BLETHYN (Pride and Prejudice, Atonement) returns as Detective Chief Inspector Vera Stanhope in this acclaimed mystery series inspired by the novels of Ann Cleeves. Against the stunning backdrop of rural Northumberland, Vera and her assistant, Detective Sergeant Aiden Healy (Kenny Doughty, Stella, Black Work), strive to solve vicious crimes that menace their community. This season finds Vera and Aiden investigating several mysterious deaths, including a park ranger found washed up on the shores of a remote wildlife reserve, a drug addict, a promising young journalism student, and a woman who had disappeared six weeks earlier. Despite her unconventional ways and abrasive personality, Vera continues to captivate in this long-running British mystery that is “sheer heaven for fans of police procedurals” (The Philadelphia Inquirer).'] Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Mystery & Suspense/British Mystery Theater, Television/Crime', 'Format': 'NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Jamie Childs, Kenny Doughty, Louise Hooper, John Hayes, Brenda Blethyn, Lee Haven Jones', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '4', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'AMP2613', 'Director': 'Jamie Childs, Louise Hooper, Lee Haven Jones, John Hayes', 'Media Format': 'NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '6 hours and 13 minutes', 'Release date': 'October 24, 2017', 'Actors': 'Brenda Blethyn, Kenny Doughty', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': 'Acorn', 'Number of discs': '4'} Review Text: Very involved and convoluted stories.
Vera is less disheveled and cranky than in series 1-6. Miss her snarky comments to her underlings. Review Title: Sharp but Less Snarky! SUMMARY:
This individual exhibits a strong preference for well-crafted narratives, frequently gravitating toward drama and historical content with rich character development. High ratings consistently align with engaging character portrayals, emotional depth, and intricate plots. The reviewer enjoys intense themes, such as betrayal and evolution, often praising performances where actors convey complex emotions through body language.

Common themes in their purchases include a focus on intense emotional storytelling, typically related to historical or dramatic contexts. They appear to appreciate content that explores the human condition, relationships, and moral dilemmas. Quality seems paramount, as indicated by consistent high ratings across various interactions, but they are also critical of production flaws, as seen in their lower rating for a film described as having "poor quality."

While price sensitivity isn't directly noted, the preference for premium quality content suggests they may prioritize value over cost, especially for narrative depth and strong performances. Overall, the core preferences reflect an individual who seeks enriching viewing experiences that blend drama, historical themes, and powerful character-driven stories, coupled with a discerning eye for quality in execution.

target_interaction.title: Great Star Pairing Makes the Movie
target_interaction.text: A romantic drama well acted by Costner and Houston.  A big plus is the sound track.
